      • setRecurring

        public void setRecurring()
        Call if the first payment or authorisation of a continuous authority sequence. Subsequent repeats can be initiated using the "Repeat a Payment" call. Details can be found here https://developer.paypoint.com/payments/docs/#payments/repeat_a_payment
